query:
SELECT s.name as subject_name, COUNT(q.id) as question_count
FROM subjects s
LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId
GROUP BY s.id, s.name
ORDER BY s.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yp3nD2VtcmPj65.root --database Zt6E6wVVzDENrVcXUKGBHG --execute SELECT s.name as subject_name, COUNT(q.id) as question_count
FROM subjects s
LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId
GROUP BY s.id, s.name
ORDER BY s.name;
